member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.AlphaMaskEffect
member.summary: Changes the opacity of an image by applying an alpha mask from a second image.

remarks.p: This effect combines the alpha channel of its AlphaMask input image with the specified Source image. RGB values of the AlphaMask are ignored.
